subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Lightning’s goalie, unlike his New York counterpart Henrik Lundqvist, has little playoff experience, but he seemed calm and unemotional after giving up 10 goals over the last two games of the Eastern Conference finals.
snippet: The Lightning’s goalie, unlike his New York counterpart Henrik Lundqvist, has little playoff experience, but he seemed calm and unemotional after giving up 10 goals over the last two games of the Eastern Conference finals.
